casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michelle Lynn BAILEY. No. 166P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bailey, Michelle Lynn. Victoria Voight, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of May 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
JACKSON, J., recused.
